Summary: saw a UFO on maps.google over many areas in our neighborhood
divs: sighting detailswas in zillow.com checking to see how much value our home had lost. saw a pink\orange disc shaped object in the sky just to the west of the house. showed it to a few people at work, and everyone thought it was very weird and no one had ever seen anything like it. then had my daughter look at it. she used a different search engine, maps.google.com, street view, our address (listed above, you said don't put personal information in this section). we (my daughter, husband, and myself) spent an hour or so looking at various streets in our foothills community. we saw it in many areas in different angles, behind clouds, behind trees, over telephone wires, etc., a little different in each location, closer, farther. the pictures are big and clear. we have a particular address in the area where it showed up quite far away, as though it were leaving our neighborhood at that point. the appearance is a disc shaped object which is enclosed at the upper end of a larger (quite a bit larger) egg shaped filmy container (what else to call it?) that you can see through. like a disc in a hazy plastic egg shell. please contact me and i will walk you through this process. there is no question of film being tampered with here as it is all on google.
